import { FC, useEffect, useState } from "react" import { Button, Card, Container, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap" import { useHistory, useParams } from "react-router-dom" import {useItems} from "../../../hooks/useItems" import {itemsApi} from "../../../api/moviesDB" import { Trailer } from "../../../types/models" type ParamsType= { id: string } const DetailCard: FC = () => { const {getDetail, itemDetail} =useItems() const { id } = useParams() const {goBack} = useHistory() const [trailers, setTrailers] = useState([]) useEffect(() =>{ itemsApi .getTrailerTMDB(itemDetail?.id, itemDetail?.media_type!) .then((results) => setTrailers(results)) },[]) useEffect(() => { getDetail(id) }, []) return (

Detalle: {itemDetail?.title}

  • Fecha de estreno: {itemDetail?.release_date}
  • Descripci√≥n: {itemDetail?.overview}
  • Idioma original: {itemDetail?.original_language}
{trailers?.map((trailer) =>(
))} ) } export { DetailCard }
